Header: Workshop on ' Sinhala' Language for Tamil Students Commenced
Content: A workshop on 'Sinhala' Language organized for Tamil Students residing in areas served by the 65 Division, aimed at enhancing Sinhala proficiency began at Mahadewa Suwamikal Childrenâ€™s Home on Saturday (11). 7 SLNG troops organized this workshop for 35 Students under the guidance of the General Officer Commanding 65 Division, troops.
